name: globalarrays
description:
Global Arrays (GA) is a Partitioned Global Address Space (PGAS)
programming model. It provides primitives for one-sided communication
(Get, Put, Accumulate) and Atomic Operations (read increment). It
supports blocking and non-blocking primtives, and supports location
consistency.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MVAPICH2-GDR is an optimized version of the MVAPICH2 MPI library for
GPU-enabled HPC and Deep Learning Applications. MVAPICH2-GDR is not
installable from source and is only available through a binary mirror.
If you do not find the binary you're looking for, send us an email at
mvapich@cse.ohio-state.edu. The binary mirror url is:
http://mvapich.cse.ohio-state.edu/download/mvapich/spack-
mirror/mvapich2-gdr/

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description: IBM's Engineering and Scientific Subroutine Library (ESSL).

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description: A BLAS and LAPACK wrapper library with runtime exchangable backends

dependencies.name: scalapack
dependencies.description:
ScaLAPACK is a library of high-performance linear algebra routines for
parallel distributed memory machines

dependent_to.name: openmolcas
dependent_to.description:
OpenMolcas is a quantum chemistry software package. The key feature of
OpenMolcas is the multiconfigurational approach to the electronic
structure.
